comment.body:
@Androiduser: Which ones? Collaborative platforms? Permitting description on files, comments for interaction?

I see static zites like:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/18Xou8Q9RLmt2vuiEZYBFsNUuHgK4a6yGv
http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3SeSH7wvr3KqLiYQhbQRc9TCAPCbWeH
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DaXkbpBN7d9h78T5mjB2gTV9Ui46Bjwcv/

But no dynamic framework permitting collaboration.
ZeroUP provides the uploading feature, but no collaboration. 

If you have any insight, don't hesitate to share any other platform that could fit the bill.

Thanks!
